entry.title: The Robins: Batman & Batwoman
entry.summary:
Author: SpiderFan_33

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,489Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Years after the death of Bruce Wayne, and with Dick Greyson left in a coma following an unfinished dip in the Lazarus Pit, Damian Wayne finally takes over under the cowl and ascends to new heights as Batman. Aided by his new husband Tim Drake Wayne as his Robin, Damian is ready to tackle whatever Gotham is ready to throw his way, but when a new scion of high society, Lincoln March, enters the scene, nothing is as it seems. Bruce's cousin Kate Kane, aka Batwoman, stops by to help the Batfamily figure out whether Lincoln and his vision for Gotham can be trusted, and, along the way, Kate becomes increasingly close to Barbara "Batgirl" Gordon, who has been sitting vigil over her husband Dick's hospital bed for far too long. Will sparks fly between Batgirl and Batwoman? Will Tim and Damian's new marriage survive the test Lincoln posses? Tune in to find out! (currently unfinished, adding a few chapters at a time, so bookmark for updates!)

entry.title: Face of the Sun
entry.summary:
Author: Yukhta

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,905Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 61

Summary: “And you control the sun. You must control it! Or not?! What about physics? And if you're a god, there must be books about you! And temples!” “There are books. And temples,” Damian tried with redoubled force to pull him off his jacket, but Tim clung to him with his other hand. “Lies! I haven't seen a single one dedicated to you! Certainly not in Gotham. And my parents are archaeologists, too!” “I have many names,” Damian replied dryly and finally shook Tim off. “The fact that you're an uneducated commoner says nothing about me. As for my temples,” the young man backed away. He didn't look like a god: ordinary jeans and a worn jacket with stretched pockets. Worn sneakers. Ordinary hair, black and tousled. Only his eyes stood out — such green eyes simply did not exist in nature, but there they were, right in front of Tim. “As for my temples, they are hidden. But those who want to find them always do.” or Wandering around Gotham, it is quite possible to encounter a deity stealing food from a store. If you happen to be in the right place at the right time.

entry.title: [NEW POST] BatBoy Watch Your Back
entry.summary:
Author: LittleLiability

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,366Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 22

Summary: Tim Drake despises Damian Wayne. He gets what he wants effortlessly, is the second highest in their class, and is even Robin, of all people.Damian Wayne does not care for Timothy Drake's cold eyes and calculating mind. He tries too hard to cling to the place carved for himself, and Damian is all too eager to dethrone the head of the class.Online, RobinRising and BatBoy are terrors to the Batman forums, dragging each other through the mud and getting countless threads locked in their friendly rivalry to be The Batman Fanboy of all time (even though they both agree Robin is better).OR: Tim and Damian are high school rivals, but best friends online. One day, this house of cards has to collapse.

entry.summary:
Author: noctstate

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 933Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 61

Summary: It’s been a long night. Horrendously, stupidly, long. Not for any good reasons. If it were actually the job, actually saving people, putting away criminals all night, it would be reasonable, the buzzing beneath his skin. Understandable, even. He could brush it off as just adrenaline. Call it good. Instead it’s just that he and Damian ran together the entire patrol. entry.title: Into the Fire
entry.summary:
Author: noctstate

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 395Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 38

Summary: “What are you, suicidal?!” Damian grabs the front of Tim's torn uniform, pressing him into the building's brick facade. Air is forced with a huff from lungs that have been inhaling nothing but smoke for far too long, soot covered skin layered with sweat trails—Damian wants to shake him. Wants to grab his head in both hands and slam it into the wall. Just the once. Maybe twice for good measure. Then, perhaps it could get through his skull.
